briefdescription.para: Opaque type for the XSApplicationArgument objects.

briefdescription.para: Gets the float value for the argument.
Gets the help text of the CLI argument.

memberdef.argsstring: (XSApplicationArgument xsThis, const char *name, XSApplicationArgumentType type, const char *help)
memberdef.name: XSApplicationArgument_Init

parameterdescription.para: The name of the CLI argument, including dashes (- or --)
The type of the CLI argument
The help text (pass NULL if none)

briefdescription.para: Sets the flag to 'on' for the argument.
